Progress Tracker

Much like other apps I've built, this one was inspired by my need for a specific tool to make my life easier. I was working my way through a self-paced software engineering curriculum and wanted to be able to primarily 1) track my progress and 2) estimate my completion date. I built this app and it has, indeed, solved my problem.

Check out the repo README for a tour of the app
complete with code snippet explanations and screenshots.

Tech Used: Ruby 2.4.2, Rails 5.0.6, PostgreSQL, Vanilla Javascript, Heroku

My Role: solo project, full stack

Repo
